mapper.select: SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName FROM postUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{nxPostSeq} ORDER BY type, sort

select a.nxPostSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.region ,a.postType ,a.title ,a.delNy ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,b.name as memberName ,b.nickname as memberNickName
ORDER BY nxPostSeq DESC

select a.* ,b.name as memberName ,b.nickName as memberNickName ,c.path ,c.uuidName from nxPost a join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join postUploaded c on a.nxPostSeq = c.pSeq where 1=1 and nxPostSeq = #{nxPostSeq}

select a.nxPostSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.region ,a.postType ,a.addressTitle ,a.title ,a.regDateTime ,b.nickName as memberNickName
ORDER BY nxPostSeq DESC

select a.* ,b.nickName as memberNickName ,c.path ,c.uuidName from nxPost a join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join postUploaded c on a.nxPostSeq = c.pSeq where 1=1 and nxPostSeq = #{nxPostSeq}
mapper.sql:
FROM nxPost a JOIN member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq where 1=1 and a.delNy = 0 AND a.postType = #{shPostType} AND a.region = #{shRegion}
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.addressTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND memberNickName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE nxPost SET delNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND nxPostSeq = #{nxPostSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nxPost WHERE 1=1 AND nxPostSeq = #{nxPostSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nxPost a WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
